import React from 'react' import hero from "../assets/hero1.png" const About = () => { const info=[ {text: "Years Experience", count: "04"}, {text: "Completed Projects", count: "24"}, {text: "Companies Work", count: "06"}, ] return (

About Me

go beyond to create special experiences..
hi there! I am a freelancer of Fullstack Web Developer. I work both remotely and in-house for agencies and private clients programming, WP plugins, html emails and web applications.
My website are built responsive to all browsers and devices,
My clients love working with me because I am reliable, knowledgable, fastr ,friendly and easy to communicate with..

{ info.map(content=>(

) } export default About
